pages.text: Commonly overlooked, terra moss grows in many places in the world, and can be scraped from many mossy surfaces by right-clicking with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$().$(br2)Likewise, you will find terra spores when breaking tall grass. Under the correct circumstances, these will provide a mossy surface to scrape from.

pages.name: Mossy Surfaces
pages.text: Many blocks are suitable for scraping moss from, leaving behind their pristine form and providing you with terra moss.$(br2)$(warning) Manually creating such a surface requires specific conditions.
Cobblestone or any suitable surface, placed adjacent to water, provides the perfect conditions for moss growth.
$(info) Simply right-click a water-adjacent block with terra spores to convert it into its mossy equivalent.

Once the spores have been imbued and the moss has spread to cover the entirety of the block (a process that happens rapidly), it is now ready to be harvest.$(br2)$(info) Simply right-click the mossy surface with a knife and you will obtain the moss, returning the block to its original form.

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: While it may seem tedious to go through the process of gathering & applying spores and then scraping the moss repeatedly, this system is both renewable and $(l:herbs/terra_moss#auto)automatable$().$(br2)The $(l:rituals/ritual_overgrowth)Overgrowth$() ritual bypass the need for terra spores entirely, magically causing moss to grow on $(l:herbs/terra_moss#conditions)blocks that meet the conditions$() of being water-adjacent.

pages.title: Automation
pages.text: In combination with the $(l:rituals/ritual_overgrowth)Overgrowth$() ritual and some simple tools and devices, it is entirely possible to automate the creation of terra moss.$(br2)A knife placed in a dispenser will, when the dispenser is activated, attempt to scrape moss from the block it is facing.$(br2)Any resultant moss is then output in the air directly above the dispenser.

In accord with $(l:rituals/automation)ritual automation$(), supply a single suitable block (that meets $(l:herbs/terra_moss#conditions)the conditions$()) within the radius of the ritual.$(br2)A simple redstone setup triggering the dispenser, with a hopper above, allows for moss be fed into a nearby inventory.$(br2)This process will last for as long as there are ingredients to supply the ritual, and durability on your knives.
